content: repeat from * to the end of the round 36 sts round 28 *k2tog p1 repeat from * to the end of the round 24 sts round 29 *k1 p1 repeat from * to the end of the round 24 sts round 30 *k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 12 sts cut the yarn from the ball and use a tapestry needle to weave the working yarn through the remaining 12 sts remove the dpns and pull tight to close weave all ends into the inside of the hat feel free to attach your favorite yarn or faux fur pom pom on top and enjoy **copyright 2020 erin gates no part of this pattern or photos may be reproduced in any form i do not mind if you sell the finished product but please give pattern credit back to lizzy knits you can follow me on instagram @lizzy_knits and use hashtag #everydaycablebeanie if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact me at lizzygates2@gmail com thank you ☺ 3 © lizzy knits llc 2020 looking for knitting supplies check out my yarn shop threebirdsyarnstudio com we offer a wide selection of ready to ship yarn and notions from luxury brands be sure to check out all patterns and kits from lizzy knits free shipping on domestic us orders over $100 join our rewards program to earn cash back on future orders check out our instagram page for shop updates and project photos @threebirdsyarnstudio baah yarn malabrigo we are knitters kits and more… 4 © lizzy knits llc 2021
